name: The Price Is Right
overview:
Experience the thrill of being on one of America’s most beloved game shows in The Price Is Right coin pusher by ICE.

This is one coin pusher that turned the conventional wisdom about coin pushers on their head. Apart from being a centerpiece game thanks to the six player stations, The Price Is Right upped the ante by offering three distinct playfields on the game! These playfields are based of of favorite mini-games found on the TV show: Cliff Hangers, Plinko and Safecrackers. This means that this is one game that offers much more variety than players are accustomed to from coin pushers. The skill slide coin entry makes this pusher a true test of one’s ability and this also enjoys brand appeal that all ages can enjoy.

It’s not just about pushing coins though, it’s also about bonuses! A “Showcase Showdown” bonus wheel is located at each station, driving additional play as users aim for that big win. Another standard feature is the convenient pull out ticket drawer that allows for quick loading tickets and easy access to the operator adjustments. Each player station holds 4,000 tickets, meaning less refilling visits to the game. Don’t just enjoy the right price, enjoy the right game!
